speaker: President.
english:
President. Now that the request has been moved, does anybody wish to speak in favour?
Please be patient, Mr Speroni. In accordance with the Rules of Procedure, there is one speech in favour and one against. At the moment I am asking whether anybody wishes to speak in favour.
original:
President. Now that the request has been moved, does anybody wish to speak in favour?
Please be patient, Mr Speroni. In accordance with the Rules of Procedure, there is one speech in favour and one against. At the moment I am asking whether anybody wishes to speak in favour.
